basics.name: Nicholas Morss
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: For over 15 years I have delivered web applications for a full spectrum of clients covering eCommerce, Content Management, Intranet and bespoke solutions from Startups to Enterprise levels. I operate in multi faceted rolls with a core focus on User Experience and Interface Development.

work.summary: Tech lead for the UI delivery for multiple enterprise programs of work including Office Depot, John Lewis, Moet Hennessy, Mulberry, ghd and Beaverbrooks.
highlights: Hiring and mentoring, internal and client based teams providing line management and leadership.
Project on boarding thought discovery process leading workshops to gather requirements and derive scope for MVP solutions
A stalwart of the Tacit Knowledge team enabling us to be awarded SAP hybris EMEA Partner of the year 2014 and SAP hybris Service Delivery Partner of the Year EMEA 2015.

work.summary: From a simple idea through to a suite of technical solutions I have engaged and worked with Substantive Research, an exciting FinTech London startup.
